channel.title: Free and legal Music Downloads
channel.description:
http://www.qtrax.com/
Over 25,000,000 songs
EDIT:
[Quote]Qtrax is the world’s first free and legal peer-to-peer (P2P) digital music site. Music lovers can discover new music and legally download full-length, high-quality versions of their favorite songs while compensating both the artists and the record labels through non-intrusive and relevant advertising. Qtrax has the unparalleled support of the major record labels and all of their respective publishing divisions. Qtrax and its components are developed by LTDnetwork Inc. a division of Brilliant Technologies Corporation. [/quote]

item.title: Free and legal Music Downloads
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Sounds like a scam, tbh.

Read full topic

item.title: Free and legal Music Downloads
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“varek, post:11, topic:176807”]It’s not at all legal. The news sites have been flipping out over this story.
see http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/entertainment/7213112.stm
[And just about any other news website for a similar story][/quote]

yea because its going to be a legal site… honestly i think they are just getting deals to bust people downloading music… just use other shit and forget about it. and as mopar said

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:10, topic:176807”]And still you are left with the dilemma:

Download music with large restrictions and the ability to track your usage (such as the DRM) from this qtrax site, or download unrestricted music from something like frostwire. I think I’ll go unrestricted, thanks.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Free and legal Music Downloads
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

And still you are left with the dilemma:

Download music with large restrictions and the ability to track your usage (such as the DRM) from this qtrax site, or download unrestricted music from something like frostwire. I think I’ll go unrestricted, thanks.

Read full topic
